code: @Override public void close(boolean cleanup) throws Exception {     Throwable exception = null.     try {         actorSystem.shutdown().     } catch (Throwable t) {         exception = ExceptionUtils.firstOrSuppressed(t, exception).     }     try {         artifactServer.stop().     } catch (Throwable t) {         exception = ExceptionUtils.firstOrSuppressed(t, exception).     }     if (exception != null) {         throw new FlinkException("Could not properly shut down the Mesos services.", exception).     } }
